page.title: 15BENTHAM SHOW
page.content: Bentham Agricultural Soc. will hold it's 115th Annual Show, 24-8-85. One of the longest running Shows in the country, usually held 1st Sat. in Sept. but moved 1985 to try to improve on bad weather experienced over the last three years. Present Chairman Michael Mason, Vice Chairman Joe Towers. 45 volunteer helpers. The Show has classes for cattle, sheep, horses, ponies, pets, handicrafts, horticulture, poultry, pigeons, photography and stick dressing. There are usually many hundreds of local entries. The President of the 1985 Show will be T.V. personality Jim Bowen. This year the Show will be attended by the Red Rose helicopter team who will give joy rides to the public.
